name: Flappy Bat (JokGames)
description:
This is our submission for Ludum Dare 45, Flappy Bat! The theme for this jam was Start with Nothing, and this is our interpretation! Enjoy!

Disclaimer: We recommend the Windows Executable for the below reasons:

  • Audio volume can be loud in the web version, watch your ears and headphones!
  • Rendering is more accurate in the windows version (but it's still perfectly playable in HTML)
